title: Twist of Fortune
content:
pon Enchantment +1

Twist of Fortune: When you roll 2 or less with this weapon's damage die, reroll it and take the new result.

Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal Bludgeoning damage anyway.

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

They say rich folk are never truly happy: especially true when they're targeted with this morningstar.

Twist of Fortune is one of the Morningstar Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Twist of Fortune is a magical morningstar that rerolls low damage
